mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(ser_code)),0)+1 FROM SERVICE
INSERT INTO SERVICE (SER_CODE, S_EMAIL, SER_TITLE, SER_SUB,SER_CATE, SER_SUB_CATE, SER_PRICE, SER_IMG, SER_OFFER, SER_IMGORIGIN, SER_LINE, SER_SKILL, SER_TEAM, SER_LANG, SER_FRAME, SER_DBMS, SER_SUBIMG, SER_SUBIMG2, SER_SUBIMG3, SER_ORIGINSUB, SER_ORIGINSUB2, SER_ORIGINSUB3) VALUES(#{ser_code}, #{s_email}, #{ser_title}, #{ser_sub}, #{ser_cate}, #{ser_sub_cate}, #{ser_price}, #{ser_img}, #{ser_offer}, #{ser_imgorigin}, #{ser_line}, #{ser_skill}, #{ser_team}, #{ser_lang}, #{ser_frame}, #{ser_dbms}, #{ser_subimg}, #{ser_subimg2}, #{ser_subimg3}, #{ser_originsub}, #{ser_originsub2}, #{ser_originsub3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SERVICE SET SER_TITLE = #{ser_title}, SER_SUB = #{ser_sub}, SER_PRICE = #{ser_price}, SER_IMG = #{ser_img}, SER_OFFER = #{ser_offer}, SER_IMGORIGIN = #{ser_imgorigin}, SER_LINE = #{ser_line}, SER_SKILL = #{ser_skill}, SER_TEAM = #{ser_team}, SER_LANG=#{ser_lang}, SER_FRAME=#{ser_frame}, SER_DBMS = #{ser_dbms}, SER_SUBIMG=#{ser_subimg}, SER_SUBIMG2 = #{ser_subimg2}, SER_SUBIMG3 = #{ser_subimg3}, SER_ORIGINSUB=#{ser_originsub}, SER_ORIGINSUB2=#{ser_originsub2}, SER_ORIGINSUB3 = #{ser_originsub3} WHERE SER_CODE = #{ser_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( select serv."SER_CODE",serv."S_EMAIL",serv."SER_START",serv."SER_TITLE",serv."SER_SUB",serv."SER_CATE", serv."SER_SUB_CATE",serv."SER_PRICE",serv."SER_IMG", serv."SER_LINE",serv."SER_STATUS",serv."SER_END", (select count(scode) from review where scode=serv.ser_code) as reviewcount, (select avg(rev_rate) from review where scode=serv.ser_code) as reviewavg, (select cat_name from category where cat_no=serv.ser_cate) as category, (select pro_start from promotion where pro_service = ser_code and pro_status='N' ) as pro_start, (select pro_end from promotion where pro_service = ser_code and pro_status='N' ) as pro_end, (select trunc(ser_price-(ser_price * (prodiscount / 100))) from promotion where pro_service = ser_code and pro_status='N' ) as prodiscount, (SELECT MAX(EVENT_END) FROM PAYMENT GROUP BY S_CODE HAVING s_code=serv.ser_code) as PAY_MAX, (SELECT MAX(PRO_END) FROM PROMOTION WHERE PRO_SERVICE = serv.ser_code AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_CHAR(PRO_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND pro_status <> 'Y') as PRO_MAX, (SELECT MAX(POWER_END) FROM POWERSERVICE WHERE SER_CODE = serv.ser_code AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_CHAR(POWER_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as power_max, SUB.SUB_NAME AS SUB_CATEGORY FROM SERVICE SERV, SUB_CATEGORY SUB WHERE SERV.SER_SUB_CATE = SUB.SUB_NO AND S_EMAIL = #{s_email} AND SER_STATUS = 'N' AND SER_END IS NULL ORDER BY SER_START DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT S.*, P.* FROM SERVICE S LEFT JOIN (SELECT S_CODE, MAX(TO_DATE(EVENT_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) PAY_ENDDATE FROM PAYMENT GROUP BY S_CODE) P ON S.SER_CODE = P.S_CODE WHERE S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email}
